newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico ups monthly dlr put option auction amount.
newsitem.headline: Mexico ups monthly dlr put option auction amount.

text.p: Mexico has increased the amount of its monthly dollar put option auction to $300 million per month from $200 million, the central bank said Friday.

In a statement, the Exchange Commission, made up of officials from the Finance Ministry and Banco de Mexico, said the increase was due to favorable results from the mechanism which aims to build up foreign reserves and a "favorable panorama with respect to the balance of payments."
